Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on running routes around the Brno Reservoir in Czechia. While there isn't a loop trail around the entire reservoir, there are some sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk. The article maps out 8 km of the most suitable running in the reservoir area, which includes rolling hills. Additionally, there are a couple of decent options for running near the 13th-century Veveří Castle, located a few km west of the reservoir. The article also provides information on bus access and other running routes in the area.
